Hydras:

Hydras didint said anything but his gestures delates tha he was re=
ally mad and said with a menace tone "SEal the base and sunk in the lava, w=
e will be protected while we study deeply the situation"Then he opened the =
comlink to all predacons "All predacons hould be inside the base... We will=
 enter in High security level soon"

Hydras send a secret com link to Scorp=
onok "What is the result so far onf the interrogation?"

while he waited th=
e answer He looked to Rodimus and Cyclonus and said "You two, it isnt time =
for petty quarrels so I expect that while I'm cheking the reseach Section d=
ont kill each other... I want that you two work together and seal this base=
...I dont desire any unwanted visitor; after you finish go to the throne ro=
om and wait me there; if you belive that Nightshift is a traidor, Kill him =
in the act, keep me informed"

Hydras Walked towards Reseach area and he ad=
ded Perceptor's and His signature, after a brief hesitation he added tempor=
ary Rodimus.

hydras Came in and walked towards an Perceptor and an Sleepy =
Nightlingt and he said "Is she strong enough to survive what is coming next=
??"

"i think so" said dryly perceptor.

"Her beast mode?"

"Would be chose=
n for her after she woke up"

"Let's do it"saud hydras while he took and en=
ergon-scapel and with a nodd Perceptor opened Nightlight's spark container =
after few seconds Hdyras divided Nighlight's spark in two and kept the seco=
nd one in a container; an Sleepy Nighlitgh just did a painful gesture but a=
fter the opration was done her face looked peaceful again. Hydras hide the =
container and said "You were right, Perceptor; her spark isnt a ordinary on=
e... it's one as Rampange's. Keep reseaching, this could be the beginning o=
f something good for Predacons" 

Perceptor started to monitoring Nightligh=
t again


From: Preston Carroll 
Sent: Tuesday, March 30, 2010 10:16 AM
To:=
 nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
Subject: Re: BlackFortress


  
> "Speak"said the =
male to Cyclonus

Next to Hydras a small view screen came to life and began=
 to show a
short clip of a large truck like vehicle that was leaving the Ar=
k,
bearing a distinctive likeness to Optimus Prime, almost like a cross
bet=
ween his Earthen mode and his original cybertronian mode. There was
the cab=
 front and the trailer on back, the trailer sporting two large
and fearsome=
 looking missiles. The truck looked powerful enough and
regugged enough to =
roll over the most inhospitable terrain without
slowing. It was currently m=
oving at a sedate 55 mph.

"From the reading I am getting that is . . . or =
was . . . Tuscon."
Cyclonus paused to let the import of his next words to s=
ink in, "I
believe they have found a way to utilize the Matrix."

(TAG)

Pr=
eston
